review: Looks like it will be nice to have product / service.  The device itself is very inexpensive.  It was however not simple to install and there is NO DOCUMENTATION to help.  It got on the wrong wireless network in my house and I had problems uninstalling it, then re-installing correctly.  Mostly by trial and error.  The costs of service plans from different vendors are not easy to find but some like UTube are free and fun to watch.  Controls to re-run portions of what you are watching are very crude and not easy to use.Overall --  it is a good entry point for this kind of service (Web downloaded TV programs) but you need some technical knowledge to install properly and use.
